inclusion.criterion: male adults with urethral stricture assessed to be requiring a urethroplasty with BMG
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: female adult patient with urethral strictures
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: prior diagnosis of chronic pain or systemic disease that would interfere with outcome
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: assessment or metabolism of the local anesthetics or narcotics.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: allergy to liposomal content or bupivacaine or any cross reaction to local anesthetics
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: neurological disease with impaired communication or neurological deficit to pain
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: with poor oral health with lesions
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: urethroplasties with no requirement for BMG graft
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: on daily analgesia medication required for other condition
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: consented for other clinical trials which may interfere the outcome assessment
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: unwilling for post-operative interview or survey involvement
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of CAD, prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after negative work-up for syncope with implantation of cardiac monitoring device.
